name: Mastery Challenge
description:
For Baalorlord's 2023 Challenge of Mastering cards and relics

Inspired by Monster Train, we master a relic or card by beating the game while owning a relic or 2 copies of a card. Yes, this includes Curses!

Check the mod menu for configurable start dates, set the minimum Ascension level, and required card count for a Mastery to count!
